mapper.select: SELECT pr.property_id, pr.device_id, pr.property_value, pr.ts , pr.property_label, pm.model_label FROM t_device_property_report pr LEFT JOIN t_model_property mp ON mp.id = pr.property_id LEFT JOIN t_product_model pm ON mp.product_model_id = pm.id WHERE pr.device_id = #{deviceId} AND pm.deleted = 0
